messages.content: you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
nanga ana achichepele ali ni ufulu wanji
50. Ali ni ufulu wa maphunziro ni kusamaliridwa, izi zili mu Section 13, Chapter 3 cha Constitution, komwe ana ni anthu onse ali ni ufulu wa maphunziro komanso chitetezo cha thupi ni malingaliro.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
kumenya munthu wogwidwa pomwe amavlaza ena nikulakwisa
37. Kumenya munthu sikuloledwa ni malamulo, izi zikutsimikizidwa ni Section 19, Chapter 4, chomwe chimateteza aliyense ku nkhanza ni kupezeka pachiwawa popanda chilungamo.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
ufulu wa anthu achikulire
9. Anthu achikulire ali ni ufulu wa chitetezo, kutengela ni Section 13(b), Chapter 3, lomwe limatsinika kuti boma liyenera kusamalira anthu achikulire powapatsa chitetezo ni zothaniza pamoyo wawo.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
malamulo oteteza katundu wa ana amasye
28. Constitution imateteza katundu wa ana, izi zili mu Section 23, Chapter 4, lomwe limapereka chitetezo kwa ana ku nkhanza komanso chitetezo pa katundu wawo.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
ni udindo wanji omwe nili nawo ngati mzika ya malawi muno
18. ninu ni udindo wotsatira malamulo ni kuteteza dziko, kutengela ni Section 44, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limatchula udindo wa mzika kutsatira malamulo nikuchita zofuna za dziko.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
malamulo amati chani kwa amene tagulisidwa malo mobeledwa kapena mwachinyengo

14. Malamulo amakulolani kudzafuna chilungamo ku khoti, kutengela ni Section 41, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, limene limatsimikizira kuti aliyense ali ni ufulu wopeza chilungamo kudzera m’khoti popanda ziletso.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
kodi bukhu la malamulo liti chiyani za chiyankhulo mmalawi muno

45. Limazinikira chiyankhulo chachikulu ngati Chichewa ni Chingerezi, izi zili mu Section 51, Chapter 6, lomwe limafotokoza kuti Chichewa ni Chingerezi ni zilankhulo zovomerezeka zotsogolera boma la Malawi

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
mwana akalakwisa tisamumenye malingana ni malamulo
22. Malamulo samalola kumenya ana, izi zili mu Section 23, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limateteza ana ku nkhanza, kuphatikizapo kuwalanga mwankhanza.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
kodi ni udindo wa ndani kuonetsetsa kuti anthu sakuphwanya malamulo

31. Udindo uli pa boma ni apolisi, kutengela ni Section 13, Chapter 3 cha Constitution, lomwe limapereka udindo wa boma kupereka chitetezo kwa mzika zonse kudzera mwa apolisi ni mabungwe ena a chitetezo.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
asing’anga kulanda zithumwa, mkulakwa

27. Kulanda zinthu popanda chilolezo nikulakwa, malinga ni Section 28, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limateteza ufulu wa katundu, nikunena kuti zinthu za munthu siziyenera kutengedwa popanda chilungamo kapena chilolezo.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
malamulo amati chani pamene boma lafuna kuchotsa anthu pa malo okhala kamba kofuna kumangapo chitukuko

61. Anthu ayenera kupatsidwa chipukuta malo, izi zili mu Section 28, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, komwe malamulo amateteza ufulu wa munthu aliyense wa katundu wake nipo ali ni ufulu wokhala pa malo ake kapena kulanira chipukuta malo ngati akuchotsedwa mosalungama

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
ni milandu yanji ili yosaenera kufika ku khoti

33. Milandu yaying'ono ingathe kuthetsedwa mwa mgwirizano, izi zili mu Section 133, Chapter 9 cha Constitution, komwe malamulo amalola kuti milandu yaying'ono imalizidwe mwamsanga popanda kuiponyera ku khoti.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
mafuna kudziwa dza ufulu wathu opanga ma demo
12. Malamulo amalola ma demo mwa mtendere, malinga ni Section 38, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limapereka ufulu wa anthu kusonkhana nikupanga ma demo popanda kuphwanya mtendere.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
wotiyimila samabwelesa chitukuko kumadera, malamulo amakamba chani

5. Nyumba ya Malamulo imayenera kuyimila anthu bwino, kutengela ni ndondomeko za Chapter 6, Section 8, imene imayikira patsogolo kuyimilira mzika zonse mogwirizana ni zofuna zawo nikutsatira ulamuliro wa malamulo.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
kodi malamulo a mziko lino amati chani pamkhani yachipembezo
20. Ufulu wolambira chipembedzo uli ni chitetezo, kutengela ni Section 33, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limapereka ufulu wa munthu aliyense kusankha chipembedzo komanso kulambiramo momasuka.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
ndani ali oyenera ku vota pa zisankho
43. Aliyense wazaka 18 ni kupitilira, kutengela ni Section 77(2), Chapter 6, limene limapereka ufulu kwa aliyense wa zaka 18 ni kupitilira kuti akhale ni mwayi wovota mu chisankho chilichonse

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
nanga anthu aulumali ali ni ufulu wanji

49. Ali ni ufulu wa chitetezo ni zofuna zofananira, izi zili mu Section 23, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, komwe ana olumala akuyenera kutetezedwa ni kuthanizidwa kuti akhale ni moyo wabwino ngati anzawo

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
chilango cha munthu wogwililira chinati chani
11. Chilango cha munthu ogwilira ni zaka 14, kutengela ni Section 137, Chapter 15, lomwe limapereka malamulo okhwima pa milandu yokhudza kugwilira komanso kuphwanya ufulu wa ena.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
funa kudziwa za ufulu wanga
10. Ufulu wanu uli mu Constitution ya Malawi, malinga ni Section 44, Chapter 4, lomwe limatsimikizira kuti ufulu uliwonse womwe constitution imapereka uyenera kutetezedwa mogwirizana ni malamulo.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
ndani ali ololedwa kukhala mzika ya dziko lina
40. Constitution imapereka malamulo okhazikitsa umzika, kutengela ni Section 47, Chapter 4, lomwe limatchula kuti mzika ya Malawi imapatsidwa ni ndondomeko za boma, poganizira mabwana kapena zibwana.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
kodi malamulo amati bwanji pa nkhani ya ufulu wolankhula zakukhosi
39. Constitution imapereka ufulu wolankhula, izi zili mu Section 35, Chapter 4, lomwe limapereka ufulu kwa mzika zonsedi kulankhula zakukhosi kwawo popanda choletsa.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
anthu obwela angathe kukhala mzika ya malawi muno
41. Inde, atatsatira malamulo a umzika, kutengela ni Section 47, Chapter 4, komwe Constitution imapereka njira zowonekera zopezera umzika kwa anthu obwera.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
munyumba ya malamulo muti chani pakusamalira anthu okalamba
32. Constitution imateteza anthu okalamba, izi zili mu Section 13(b), Chapter 3, komwe malamulo amatsimikizira kuti anthu okalamba ayenera kutetezedwa ni kuthanizidwa.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
musogoleri sabwelesa chitukuko kumuzi, titani
7. Anthu amatha kufunsa mafunso ku Nyumba ya Malamulo, malinga ni Section 8, Chapter 6, imene imawona kuti mzika zonse zili ni ufulu wofunsa malamulo ni zofuna za boma kudzera mwa oyimilira awo.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
malamulo amathaniza bwanji azimayi omwe achitidwa mkhamza kubanja
13. Constitution imateteza azimayi ku nkhanza, izi zili mu Section 24, Chapter 4, lomwe limatsimikizira kuti akazi ali ni ufulu wofanana ni amuna nipo ayenera kutetezedwa ku nkhanza za m’banja.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
malamulo amat chani kwa amai ni ana omwe asiidwa banja popanda thanizo

60. Malamulo amateteza amai ni ana kwa nkhanza komanso kupereka thanizo, malinga ni Section 24, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limapereka chitetezo kwa akazi ni ana kuti asakumane ni nkhanza ni kuti apatsidwe thanizo ngati athaŵa nkhanza m'banja.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
ma membala a paliyamenti amasankhidwa kutsata ndondomeko yanji

42. Amasankhidwa kudzera mu chisankho cha poyera, izi zili mu Section 67, Chapter 6 cha Constitution, lomwe limanena kuti a paliyamenti amasankhidwa mogwirizana ni chisankho choyenera komanso chisankho chopanda tsankho.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
malamulo oteteza kuti mabanja asamathe

29. Constitution imalimbikitsa kuti mabanja athetse mikangano mwamtendere, kutengela ni Section 22, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limatsimikizira kuti boma liyenera kulimbikitsa kuthetsa mikangano m'banja mwa mtendere.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
nimafuna niziwe malamulo
6. Constitution ya Malawi imakamba za ufulu wanu, mu Section 44, Chapter 4, mumanena kuti ufulu uliwonse womwe mzika ili nawo uyenera kutetezedwa ndpo suyenela kuikidwa pansi pa malamulo ena.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
ntchito zonse zili ni leave

3. Malamulo amapereka ufulu wa leave kwa ogwira ntchito onse, kutengela ni Section 31, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, limene limapereka ufulu wogwira ntchito kukhala ni maholide kapena leave monga Section la ufulu wa ntchito.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
buku la malamulo liti chani pa chitetezo cha dziko
55. Constitution imateteza chitetezo cha dziko lonse, malinga ni Section 146, Chapter 14 cha Constitution, lomwe limayang’anira chitetezo ni kulondera chitukuko cha dziko.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
anthu opanga mademo ali ni udindo wanji ngati mzika za malawi muno
21. Ali ni udindo wopanga ma demo mwamtendere, izi zili mu Section 38, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, komwe kulola kusonkhana mwamtendere.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
ufulu wa anthu wolumala uti bwa

25. Anthu olumala ali ni ufulu wa chitetezo ni kuthanizidwa, kutengela ni Section 13(g), Chapter 3 cha Constitution, lomwe limafotokoza kuti anthu olumala ayenera kukhala ni chitetezo ni kulaniridwa ngati anzawo.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
munthu ayenera kukhala ni zololedwa za+a27nji kupezeka mu nyumba ya aphungu
54. Ayenera kukhala wazaka 18 ni kupitilira, kutengela ni Section 77, Chapter 6 cha Constitution, lomwe limapereka ufulu wa mzika zonse zopitilira zaka 18 kuti azikhala ni mwayi wovota.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
malamulo amene amasogolera zilanilaa zinthu, ngati makoponi
24. Constitution imayang’anira chilungamo pakatundu wa anthu, izi zili mu Section 24, Chapter 4, lomwe limapereka chitetezo cha katundu wa akazi ni ana popanda kutsutsidwa.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
kodi malamulo amateteza bwanji ufulu wanga ngati ndatengedwa mlandu popanda chifukwa
56. Constitution imateteza ufulu wa kulaniridwa mwachilungamo, izi zili mu Section 42, Chapter 4, komwe Constitution imatsimikizira kuti aliyense ayenera kuchitiridwa chilungamo m’milandu yake.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
kodi amai apakhomo ali ni ufulu otsutsa ndemanga ya amuna awo ngati sanasangalale nayo

35. Amayi ali ni ufulu wodandaula nikufuna chilungamo, izi zili mu Section 24, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limapereka ufulu kwa akazi kuti akhale ni mau nipo afufuze chilungamo ngati sanasangalale ni zimene amuna awo achita.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
malamulo amat chani pa mikangano ya malo ku muzi

59. Milandu ya malo imathetsedwa ni nyumba za malamulo ni amfumu, izi zili mu Section 213, Chapter 18 cha Constitution, komwe malamulo amateteza ufulu wa katundu wa mzika nipo milandu ya malo ikhoza kuthanizidwa ni nyumba za malamulo kapena amfumu.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
kodi ana anga akhoza kupeza maphunziro aulere malinga ni malamulo
57. Inde, ana ayenera kupeza maphunziro aulere, malinga ni Section 25, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limatsimikizira kuti ana ali ni ufulu wophunzira nipo boma liyenera kupereka maphunziro.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
kodi malamulo amateteza bwanji miyambo ni zikhalidwe zathu zaku malawi
58. Constitution imalemekeza miyambo ya anthu, izi zili mu Section 26, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limapereka ufulu kwa aliyense kutsatira chikhalidwe ni miyambo yawo popanda tsankho.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
malamulo omasiyana akumuz ni ntauni, nanga bwanji kumuzi kulibe chitukuko

23. Malamulo ni ofanana, chitukuko chili pa ndondomeko za boma, malinga ni Section 199, Chapter 10 cha Constitution, lomwe limayang’anira mabungwe a boma kuti azigwira ntchito mogwirizana ni zofuna za anthu.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
nanga mtsogoleri wa dziko amayenera kulamulira kwa nthawi yochuluka bwanji
52. Amalonda kwa zaka zisanu, malinga ni Section 83, Chapter 8, mtsogoleri wa dziko amasankhidwa kukhala m'malo kwa nthawi ya zaka zisanu nipo amatha kuyimanso kamodzi kokha.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
kodi amfumu ammudzi ali ni mphanvu yanji yosova milandu mmudzi
34. Amfumu amakhala ni udindo wowona milandu yaying'ono, malinga ni Section 110(3), Chapter 9, lomwe limapereka mphamvu kwa amfumu kuti azitha kuweruza milandu yaying'ono komwe kumadera awo.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
kodi amai ni ana ali ni ufulu wanji malingana ni buku la malamulo
38. Ali ni ufulu wofanana ni chitetezo, kutengela ni Section 20, Chapter 4, lomwe limapereka chitetezo chofanana kwa aliyense popanda tsankho pazifukwa zilizonse.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
munthu wokuba mbuzi chilango chake ni chani

36. Chilango chimaonekeratu ni khoti, koma nthawi zambiri zimakhala m'ndende, malinga ni malamulo a Section 137 cha Chapter 15 cha Constitution chomwe chimakhazikitsa milandu ni malamulo a chiwawa, kuphatikizapo kuba.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
kodi malamulo amateteza bwanji ufulu wa ana

48. Malamulo amateteza ana ku nkhanza ni kupereka maphunziro, malinga ni Section 23, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limatsimikizira kuti ana ayenera kulaniridwa popanda kugwidwa ni nkhanza komanso kupatsidwa maphunziro oyenera

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
banja likatha koma mkazi sanapange nawo contribute zinthu niwoyenela kutengako gawo laachuma

4. Malamulo amateteza nkazi ngakhale sanapange contribute, izi zili mu Section 24, Chapter 4 cha Constitution ya Malawi, lomwe limatsimikizira kuti nkazi ali ni ufulu m'banja ngakhale sanapereke gawo lake la ndalama, komanso akuyenera kulaniridwa mopanda tsankho.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
ogwila ntchito mu boma ali ni ufulu wanji

62. Ali ni ufulu wokhala pa ntchito, kulipilidwa, ni chitetezo, kutengela ni Section 31, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limapereka ufulu wa ntchito ni kulanira malipiro oyenera komanso chitetezo kwa aliyense.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
buku la malamulo liti chani pa ufulu wokhala ni moyo
47. Ufulu wokhala ni moyo uli ni chitetezo cha malamulo, kutengela ni Section 16, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, komwe kulambira moyo wa munthu ni chitetezo chopanda malire

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
ana achichepele ali ni ufulu wanji

30. Ali ni ufulu wa maphunziro ni chitetezo, malinga ni Section 23, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limatsimikizira kuti ana onse ali ni ufulu wophunzira ni kutetezedwa ku nkhanza kapena kusasamala.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
nimafuna kudziwa za malamulo a mdziko lino
16. Constitution ni ndondomeko zazikulu za malamulo, izi zili mu Section 5, Chapter 1 cha Constitution, chomwe chimakhazikitsa Constitution ngati gwero lalikulu la malamulo a dziko.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
nichifukwa chiyani akagwilira alumangidwa amuna wokha

1. Amuna ni akazi onse amamangidwa malingana ni mlandu, kutengela ni Section 20, Chapter 4 cha Buku la Malamulo a Malawi, lomwe limaletsa kusankhana pa kugwiritsa ntchito malamulo, nipo onse ayenera kukhala ni mlandu ofanana.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
atsikana sakupitiliza maphunziro chifukwa chamabanja achangu
8. Ana onse ayenera kumaliza sukulu, izi zili mu Section 13, Chapter 3 cha Constitution, komwe kumatchula kuti boma liyenera kupereka maphunziro kwa ana onse mpaka kukwaniritsa zofunikira zawo.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
mtsogoleri wa dziko ali ni udindo wanji kwa mzika

53. Ali ni udindo woteteza ni kutsogolera dziko, kutengela ni Section 88, Chapter 8 cha Constitution, lomwe limapereka kuti mtsogoleri wa dziko ali ni udindo wokhazikitsa malamulo nikutsogolera chitukuko cha dziko.

15. Ndondomeko za city council zili ni ulamuliro wa nyumba za malamulo, izi zikukhudzana ni Section 146, Chapter 14, komwe malamulo a nyumba za boma amasamalira ndondomeko za chitukuko kumidzi ni m’matauni.
